ovdesc.p: This table is maintained by the common build routine for the enquiries:
These enquiries build a view of the table AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL summarised by exposed currency.

desc.p: This field holds the forward rate that is to be used for the underlying AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL records and their resultant FOREX deals.
This field has been supplied as a convenience for local use.
This field allows for a trade date to be entered that is to be applied to all underlying AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL records.
This field has been supplied as a convenience for local use.
This field holds the spot rate that is to be used for the underlying AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL records and their resultant FOREX deals.
This field has been supplied as a convenience for local use.
This field holds the ID of the workfile record.
This field cannot be amended.
This field holds the hedging factor that is to be applied to the underlying AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL records.
On validation, the HEDGE.AMOUNT field will be populated with the appropriate amount that is to be hedged and all underlying
This field allows for a maturity date to be entered that is to be applied to all underlying AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL records.
This field has been supplied as a convenience for local use.
This field holds the reference currency of the Portfolio relating to the workfile record.
This field cannot be amended.
This field allows for a value date to be entered that is to be applied to all underlying AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL records.
This field has been supplied as a convenience for local use.
This field contains the exposed currency for the workfile record.
This field cannot be amended.
This field allows for the entry of a dealer reference.
This field has been supplied as a convenience for local use.
This field holds a list of AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL records that have been summarised to create a workfile record.
This field cannot be amended
This field holds the total exposed amount for currency hedging. This total is made up from the exposed totals from the underlying AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL records.
This field cannot be amended.
This field holds the ID of the originating AM.CCY.HEDGE.REQUEST.
This field cannot be amended.
This field holds the total amount that is to be hedged for all underlying AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL records.
This field is populated when a hedging factor has been entered using on of the enquiries and the row has been commited.
